price: هغوى پرته له قيامته د بل شي انتظار نه كوي، چې يو ناڅاپه ورته راشي او هغوى خبر هم نه وي.
arabic: هَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: hal yanẓurūna illā al-sāʿata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
